articles.author: Nisha Anand
articles.title: List of cities with world's best public transport. Indian city finds place - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Five Asian cities made to the list of top 10 with the best public transport systems, while Mumbai secured the 19th spot and was the top-ranked Indian city. | World News
articles.content: Germanys Berlin was ranked as the city with the best public transport system globally, followed by Czech Republics capital Prague, while Mumbai secured the 19th spot and was the top-ranked Indian cit… [+1956 chars]
